topics.body:
There's a picture I've been thinking about making. Monsterized Nightmare Moon in a confused pose saying "The hell is an Islam?" to the standard human Muslimshy. The whole thing is just supposed to be a lighthearted poke at putting abrahamic religions in a world where they don't exist, nothing angry or insulting.

Think that would end with people flying into a frenzy? Granted I might just draw it either way, cause I like making jokes.

topics.body:
Well with the 2014 elections being in fullswing and every politician trying to hide every bad thing they did during the last year, like a five year old trying to hide the glass from a window they broke while playing baseball but forgetting to cover up the window, it's safe to say this election year is going to be short. . very short.

What I mean by this is the usa is looking at drastic improvement after the elections; the reason being is that old school republicans have officially metaphorically declared war on the tea party like a bunch of colonists throwing tea into a harbor.  Their reason being is that all the early elections have resulted in next to no tea party members actually succeeding in getting re-elected, which posses a problem for a party that wants to get re-elected.  So huzzah the tea party won't have a single member getting elected in 2014 cause now not only do they have zero chance of getting re-elected they now have to deal with the people who rain money down on them like a bank raining money down to ceo's now all piling on them to beat the living shit out of them before they cost the republican party anymore seats.

Tl:dr; Old school republicans with the money grew a brain and are now beating the living shit out of the tea party and dragging them out of the caucuses minus a few teeth to prevent the tea party from costing them anymore seats.

In other words:  Congratulations republicans you finally get your party back from the people that have been shitting on it for the last six years.

topics.body:
On the Elder Scrolls thing.

I always wanted to have a quest like that. An alterbative to saving Phaartunax and a branching path from the Civil War.

The Blades are pretty much dying. You are the leader of the three/four factions that used to compose the Blades: Warriors (Companions), Spies (Thieves) and of course, Assassin's (Brotherhood).

How about unite those factions under a single flag and undermine the Thalmor from the inside, while at the same time, forcing them to lower their forces to deal with trouble in other areas, driving them away from Skyrim and reach a trouse between Stormcloacks and the Legion, but keeping the climate of war to avoid suspiscions.

Rally several underground movements in places like the Black Marsh and begin to train several of your friends as the Blades to serve as Special agents. Enchanting their equipment and upgrading it to the max.
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

Nah, fuck that.  I'd rather just have it to where if you kill everything that fucking moves you get their shit.
"You don't like being ruled by a tyrant?  Well too bad; I murdered every last thing on the planet and if you don't want to end up how I sent everyone that defies my into a prehistoric hunger games then go make me some coffee"

topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f

topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/531e915c6368723cea610000#post_531e915c6368723cea610000
Because the first one costs way more money. Which is the sad truth about most things actually, the cooler, more artistic vision dies to simple utilitarian fact.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7

topics.body:
The former is also no doubt the old quarter of a larger city where that style was fashionable, where the later is the newer add-on.

The Industrial Revolution may have also played a part in Europe, with such things as the famous Terraced housing of the Victorian and the Edwardian that'd certainly have a roll in the idea of mass-produced housing to accommodate a rapidly growing urban population.

And if you have a small space where everyone's trying to get into, land's going to be at a premium and you're going to need to make the best of that. Efficient construction with efficient production and efficient space.
topics.author: 4fe4bf947f123b175b000001

topics.body:
"@AaronMk":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/531e997a63687272d0f80000#post_531e997a63687272d0f80000
Modern society has no respect for culture and history. They rather destroy what makes them, them. The last thing we want is the world adopting a Maoist style Cultural Revolution. God knows how much Chinese artifacts, writings, and things they've destroyed. 

[spoiler]Those who were responsible deserve to be burned.[/spoiler]

"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/531e9c476368727e9d4c0000#post_531e9c476368727e9d4c0000
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/531e915c6368723cea610000#post_531e915c6368723cea610000
Becuase of a Function Over Form mindset that is present today. Whether this is bad or not is up to debate.[/bq]
In the short run it's bad cause culture is getting ran over like the approval rating of a corrupt batshit politician who can't be bothered whether or not opening their mouth and running over their re-election bid is a good idea or not and instead just throws money at the dead corpse of their political career thinking that throwing money on a corpse will somehow make resurrect itself like a jewish religious figure.

In the long run it's good for society cause companies want to wank off with loads of cash and invest tons of money into cheaper building materials like EA investing ridiculous sums of money into a new COD game.

Whether or not it's good or bad I can't decide, cause on the one hand culture is getting destroyed like a headcrab that thought jumping the scientist wielding a crowbar was a good idea; on the other hand they're making investing money into the people that actually make the thing and giving them money to live off of.

I just did it again like a fifty year old who downloads a virus that's claiming to be a anti-virus and doesn't understand people on the internet lie and thus keeps doing it over and over again.
